About.title:
The Studio Behind
The Code.
About.subtitle: NIMA Studio is a distributed collective of senior engineers and designers, led by Nima Afsharfar. We don't just write code; we build businesses.

founder.p1: With over 12 years of experience in full-stack development, I've seen the good, the bad, and the ugly of software engineering.
founder.p2: I started NIMA Studio with a simple mission: to provide startups and businesses with the kind of engineering quality usually reserved for Silicon Valley giants.
founder.p3: We reject the "agency model" of outsourcing to junior devs. When you work with us, you work with senior architects who understand your business goals.
